frameDefinitions: A Person is in a state of prosperity and/or renown after some period of development or hardship in an Endeavor.
This frame concerns an Evaluee being judged for its quality, i.e. how much it would probably be liked.

An Agent has attempted to achieve a Goal, and the actual outcome of the Agent's action has been resolved, so that it either specifically matches the Agent's intent (e.g. success) or does not match it (e.g. failure).
The words in this frame describe an Experiencer's feelings of tolerating with respect to some Content.
A Survivor manages to avoid being negatively affected, despite encountering a Dangerous_situation.

The Means action by which a deprofiled agent (the Protagonist) has attempted to achieve a Goal, is finished and the actual outcome of the Means action has been resolved, so that it either specifically matches the Protagonist's intent (e.g. success) or does not match it (e.g. failure).
frameExamples: He <t>pulled</t> <t>off</t> his April Fool's Day prank by the barest of margins .
He could not <t>tolerate</t> the smell of coconut .
Wilderness Survival: Could You <t>Survive</t> the Wild?
listRoleDefinitions: A sentient being or group of beings that is prosperous or well known after being involved in some <fen>Endeavor</fen>.
An event that the <fen>Person</fen> is involved in which leads to their state of prosperity or renown.
The time when the <fen>Entity</fen> is determined to be successful.
The <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged for its quality.
This role marks expressions that denote a scalar property of the <fen>Evaluee</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged.
The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve.
A participant function in a particular event or in events of a particular kind.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt succeeds or fails.
The place where an attempt succeeds or fails.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> experiences tolerance with respect to the <fen>Content</fen>.

<fen>Content</fen> is what the <fen>Experiencer</fen>'s feeling of tolerance is directed towards..  The <fen>Content</fen> differs from a stimulus because the <fen>Content</fen> is not construed as being direcly responsible for causing the emotion.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the area about which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> has the  tolerated experience(s).
The <fen>State</fen> is the abstract noun that describes a more lasting experience by the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
The <fen>Event</fen> is the occasion or happening that <fen>Experiencer</fen>s in a certain emotional state participate in.
The time at which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in the state of toleration.
The <fen>Survivor</fen> lives through a <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen>.
The <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen> is one in which people are likely or expected to be negatively affected.
The time at which the surviving takes place.
The location where the <fen>Survivor</fen> (primarily) lives during the <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen>.
The action that the agent undertakes to achieve the <fen>Goal</fen>.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the agent attempts to achieve by performing the <fen>Means</fen> action.
An entity directed by the agent as part of the <fen>Means</fen> action in order to accomplish the <fen>Goal</fen>.
A participant function of an <fen>Instrument</fen> or <fen>Means</fen> in a particular event or in events of a particular kind.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt succeeds or fails
The place where <fen>Means</fen> action succeeds or fails.
listRoleExamples: <fex>He</fex> became a success at the age of 25.
Looking back, I had a very successful <fex>career</fex>.
After 20 years of hard work, he finally made it as an artist <fex>in '84</fex>.
He gave me another lame <fex>excuse</fex>.
The Beaujolais Nouveau is dazzling <fex>in freshness</fex>.
<fex>John</fex> managed a feeble smile.
If you don't succeed <fex>in your subterfuge</fex>, then report back for further orders.
Benedikt was successful <fex>as a master brewer of beer</fex>.
<fex>On the bridge</fex> he succeeded in putting the wig on the corpse.
Everyone must endure <fex>some disappointments in life</fex>.
They 're very tolerant <fex>about boys' mess in the home and untidiness generally</fex>.
Tracy was in a surprisngly tolerant <fex>mood</fex> today.
<fex>When they are young,</fex>, they  cannot stand extremes of temperature.
<fex>Last year</fex>, Florida residents survived the devastating triple punch of Hurricanes Frances, Ivan and Jeanne,
<fex>His daring, almost reckless, move</fex> succeeded and he lived to fight another day.

This move succeeded <fex>in securing trade concessions and the release of imprisoned
American sailors</fex>.
All of my usual source books seemed incomplete, but <fex>your website</fex> did the trick!
The machine was successful <fex>as a reconnaissance vehicle</fex>.
But it did the trick <fex>at the time</fex>.
A similar strategy, perhaps even bloodier, did the trick <fex>in El Salvador</fex>.
